result.title: QT capabilities database of QT stakeholders and research activities across Europe
result.description: The goal of this task is to work with the Quantum Technology Flagship, other European initiatives in QT, and the QuantERA SAB, funding agencies and industrial and research stakeholders to create a database of QT capabilities and research projects across Europe.The proposed capability database will contain a list of stakeholder organisations with:• Organisational type;• QT activities;• QT research projects, both public and privately funded; and• QT contact points.Data will be collected using a multi-channel strategy:1. Data from QuantERA funding agencies and partners, e.g. Quantum Technology Flagship;2. Data from other European efforts, such as QUROPE (Quantum Information Processing and Communication in Europe) and other Coordination and Support Actions (CSA);3. Data submitted directly by stakeholders through the interactive tool mentioned below.The collected data will be accessible through an interactive, searchable tool on the QuantERA website.

project.title: QuantERA ERA-NET Cofund in Quantum Technologies
